db:abstract.db:para: The SplineSeries type is used for making spline charts.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The following QML shows how to create a simple spline chart:

db:section.db:title: capStyle : Qt::PenCapStyle
db:section.db:para: Controls the cap style of the line. Set to one of Qt.FlatCap, Qt.SquareCap or Qt.RoundCap. By default the cap style is Qt.SquareCap.

db:section.db:title: style : Qt::PenStyle
db:section.db:para: Controls the style of the line. Set to one of Qt.NoPen, Qt.SolidLine, Qt.DashLine, Qt.DotLine, Qt.DashDotLine or Qt.DashDotDotLine. Using Qt.CustomDashLine is not supported in the QML API. By default the style is Qt.SolidLine.

db:section.db:title: width : real
db:section.db:para: The width of the line. By default the width is 2.0.
